title: Big Bang
summary: Initialization of the universal ledger; first tick, causal stride c = 1 voxel/tick, routing-pressure relaxation under J(x)=1/2(x+1/x); no physical point singularity.

title: The Ledger
summary: The universe's double-entry accounting system that tracks all recognition events with immutable positive cost.

title: Meta-Principle
summary: The foundational axiom: nothing cannot recognize itself, forcing existence of non-trivial recognition.

title: Speed of Light
summary: The fixed stride of one voxel per tick defines the universal speed limit c.

title: 8-Beat Cycle
summary: The fundamental eight-tick recognition cycle arising from traversing a 3D voxel's vertices.

title: Dark Matter
summary: Unresolved voxel-edge interference patterns that manifest as missing mass, with Ω_dm ≈ 0.2649.

title: Coherence Energy
summary: The fundamental energy quantum E_coh arising from minimal recognition cost.

title: Inflation
summary: Rapid early expansion as routing-pressure relaxation under the cost functional J(x).

title: Cosmic Microwave Background
summary: Relic radiation from ledger decoupling epoch, encoding primordial recognition patterns.

title: Entropy
summary: Count of indistinguishable recognition paths; bridges microscopic ledger states to macroscopic behavior.
